description:
Up to Date as at: January 2016.

In this course we will cover how to create a Hand Cross Stitch pattern using the Embird Cross Stitch plugin and Embird Software

The course is just under 60 min.

In this course of 7 videos we have looked at:

  • buying the Embird Software.
  • getting the correct size image to work from
  • Setting up your work area
  • Creating the stitches with the min number of colors but still have a great pattern
  • create the PDF pattern to send to the client
  • Create the Cover Picture
  • Zip the lot and email to client or put in Dropbox and send the link.

You will also see the samples of the project in PDF and .jpg for this project

Students who want to earn some money on the side can use their Embird Software to Create and Sell:

  1. pictures of grand children as Cross Stitch Patterns
  2. pictures of pets that have past as Cross Stitch Patterns
  3. any scene converted into a Cross Stitch Pattern

These services can be advertised on Face Book, twitter and Pinterest for FREE
title: Embird Cross Stitch hand pattern making for an income
